issue.title: [Java/Python] Complex type conversion in pyarrow.Field.from_jvm
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2609](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2609). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The converter `pyarrow.Field.from_jvm` currently only works for primitive types. Types like List, Struct or Union that have children in their definition are not supported. We should add the needed recursion for these types and enable the respective tests.
